abhiyachanadhikarana winisuru janak silwa mahatha (sabhapathi) abhiyachanadhikarana winisuru bandula karunarathna, wishramika abhiyachanadhikarana winisuruwarun wana sunil rajapaksha saha bandula athapaththu yana mahathwarun adhikarana amathyanshaye hitapu lekam dabliw.

nayakathwayada sahamulinma winasha kirimeni.mehidi mema jayakgrahanayata yudha,guwan,nawuka,polisiya(wishesha karya balakaya,thrastha wimarshana ansha ),siwil aarakshaka balakaya,buddhi ansha,siwil aarakshaka kamitu,mahajanaya menma meyata deshapalana nayakathwaya yana siyulu denatama himi deyaki.kawurun ho eya thama karapu deyak lesa kima kuhaka kamaki.palath sabha mathiwarana waladi aanduwa wisin yudha jayakgrahanaya wikuna chandaya laba gaththey,ada wanawita sarath fonseka mahatha wisin ee dema sidu karamin pawathi.sarath fonseka mahatha janadhipathiwaranayata tharanga kirimata wiruddhawa katha kirimata apata ayithiyak natha.eya ethumage manawa himikamaki,namuth ethuma samanga athwal bandagena aththe eda ethumata hathurukam kala pirisa samangaya(jawipe adala natha.jawipe wisin mema yuddhaya kirima sandaha mahinda rajapaksha mahathawa pelambaawimata wishala karyabharayak sidu kaleya,namuth ehi prathipala labena wita owun mahinda samanga sitiye natha.prathipala bukthiwinde wenath pirisya.ada wanawita jawipe noyayuthu margayaka,gaman karamin pawathi.eyata wagakiwa yuththe ehi ihala nayakathwaya we.)sarath fonseka mahathata anuwa metharam kal yuddhaya dinagatha nohakiwune hamudawange pawathi durwalatha nisaya,aanduwata anuwa metharam kal yuddhaya dinagatha nohakiwune yuddhayata awashya deshapalana nayakathwaya nolabu nisaya.me deken kumak niwaradi da,me dekama owun pawasanne thamanta wasiwana ayurenya.mata anuwanam meyata hethuwa deweni karanaya we.namuth emagin kisiwitakath meya aanduwe jayakgrahanayak kirimata mama uthsaha nokarami. 1987 arambau wadamarachchi meheyumedi

idikirim katayuthu nila washayen aarambha weyi.ape mathrubhumiya dakunu aasiyawe suwisheshithama ha wadath paripurna wanija kendrasthanaya bawata pathkarana mema nawa wyapruthiye idikirim katayuthu aarambha kirima shri lanka janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha saha china janadhipathi shi jinpin mahathwarunge pradhanathwayen mahath abhimanayen yuthuwa eeye (17) perawaruwe sidu kerini.
me thaththwaya niwaradi kara ganimata enam penima yatha paridi sakasa ganimata kruthrima aadharakayak lesa askannadi bhawitha kirimata siduweyi.
namuth swamini, maranin pasu sugathiyata yanawa kiyana karanawa mama obawahanse kerehi wishwasayen, shraddhawen piliganne.
in eha obbata giya, gatha haki kriya marga gana nam ma danne naha.

eya sammatha kara ganimata sahaya wima janathawa gana sithana siyalu deshapalanagnyayange wagakimak bawayi sthana kihipayaka di awadharanaya kerune.

1977 di je.aar rajaya pihitu wigasama thama pakshika manthriwarungen dina rahitha, eheth athsana sahitha, lipi labagena parlimenthu balaya udura ganimin mahajana niyojanaya nihanda kala aakarayath, emagan thamanata risi paridi aanngukrama wyawasthawa, ehi sanshodhana (13 athuluwa) ha anapanath sammathakaragath aakarayath ada boho denek nodani.

ee eeth padhanagharawalata yabadawa thiyena kasikili gal harima apuru katayamwalin pirila ithirila gihin. bauddha chinthana dharawata anuwa puhu alankaraya koyi tharam nam nissara deyakda kiyana loka dharmathawaya me tharam apuruwata kalathmakawa ee wagema sankethathmakawa prakasha karapu wenath kisima awasthawak, wenath kisima sthanayak mage mathakayata nagenne naha. chaithyaya wate palathuru athurala, mal athurala, chaithyaya bande bauddha kodi porawala, chaithyayata udin walakulu walin mawena buddha rupa ganan karala, ahase mathuwena buduras heya hoya ehemath nathinam warga hata haththawaka kama bima walin budunta dan piliganwala kisiyam keneku budunge dharmaya hoyannata uthsaha karanawa nam eeka ee athi wishishta chinthana dharawata, darshanika sampradayata karana nigrahayak witharak nemeyi maha awamanayak.

ada rate athi lingika asahanayata boho wita piliyam yedenuye me jak sanskruthiyen bawa kiwahoth, meke sitina ekala mawa ban karana thanata katayuthu karanu atha.eheth aththa eekaya.badu pot pawa thahanam rate mehema wath aathal ekak gannata thanak nathnam mitath wada lingika hinsawan wadi wenu atha.kotata andagena, eka puliye damagena, gala pennagena yana kellekuta, bas ekedi ho dum riyedi, jakak gasa,eekitath haniyak nowi, (samaharawita eekita aathal ekakuth di) shep eke eekigen aathal ekak ganima,eeki nisa molwi, passen gos, palu thanakadi ee kellawa, dushanaya kota mara damanawata wada hondaya.jak gasana un boho wita karanne, ehema ekigen aathal ekak gena, gedara gos ee kellawa mathak kota athe parak gasa budiya ganimaya.ehen mehen palagena aa kellatath oona aathal eka, eekitath labi atha.ape ekage asahanayath nathi wi atha.katawath haniyak with natha.
uba ube ananyathawaya sirawatama thibba machan..
ehema awith, mage jiwithaya iwara kara ganna hitha hitha innakota ma, oya awith mage waha tika biwwa."
